```{r}
### Load Processed Geodata from "reproducible" Folder

# Set base path for reproducible geodata
path_base_geodata_reproducible <- here::here("data", "reproducible", "geodata")

# Load each geodata file individually
shp_gemeinde <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "shp_gemeinde.gpkg"))
df_regiostar_complete <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "df_regiostar_complete.gpkg"))
df_regiostar_geo <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "df_regiostar_geo.gpkg"))
df_states_geo <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "df_states_geo.gpkg"))
df_states_geo_simplified <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "df_states_geo_simplified.gpkg"))
df_internal_borders <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "df_internal_borders.gpkg"))
states_border_clean_sf <- sf::st_read(file.path(path_base_geodata_reproducible, "states_border_clean_sf.gpkg"))
```
